comments.body: Is this only needed for Windows? It does not interfere in the other platforms?

> Is this only needed for Windows? It does not interfere in the other platforms?

I don't think so, the PR build (once it works) should show us if it has side effects

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +99,103 @@     PRIVATE
        ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/core/foundation/inc   # needed for string_view backport
        ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ginclude
     PUBLIC
        ${python_include_dir}
